nodes.text: Star Wars Art: Ralph McQuarrie is a book showcasing the artwork of Star Wars concept artist Ralph McQuarrie. The 800-page, two-book set was published in hardcover by Abrams Books on September 27, 2016 for $250. The collection has a foreword by George Lucas and features over 2,000 illustrations rescanned and rephotographed from conceptual paintings, costume designs, storyboards, book covers, and Lucasfilm holiday cards.
